Title: Ex-Yankees lefty J.A. Happ’s not at Twins spring training due to COVID
Description: J.A. Happ’s quest for a rebound season with the Minnesota Twins after a frustrating 2020 with the Yankees will be on hold for another week or so. Due to a positive COVID-19 test, the veteran left-hander hasn’t reported to Twins spring training in Fort Myers,
Author: NJ.com
